horse_breed.name: appaloosa
horse_breed.personality: Appaloosas are friendly, curious, and adaptable horses. They are intelligent, easy to train, and suitable for riders of all levels. Appaloosas are people-oriented, forming strong bonds with their owners, and are popular for trail riding, ranch work, and rodeo events

horse_breed.name: thoroughbred
horse_breed.body_type: Deep chest; lean, athletic build; long neck; powerful hindquarters
horse_breed.personality: The Thoroughbred horse is known for its athleticism, speed, and courage. They are intelligent and curious, with a strong desire to learn and please their handlers. They can be high-spirited and energetic, but are also affectionate and loyal companions

horse_breed.name: arabian
horse_breed.body_type: Lithe, compact body; small, wedge-shaped head; dished facial profile, long, arched neck
horse_breed.personality: The Arabian horse is known for its intelligence, sensitivity, and loyalty. They are quick learners and form strong bonds with their owners. They can be high-spirited, but are also gentle and affectionate

horse_breed.name: american paint
horse_breed.body_type: Strong, well-balanced body; colorful coat patterns; powerful hindquarters
horse_breed.personality: The American Paint horse is known for its intelligence, versatility, and gentle disposition. They are athletic and excel in a variety of disciplines, including Western and English riding, rodeo events, and trail riding. They are easy to train and form strong bonds with their owners. They are also known for their striking coat patterns, which make them stand out in a crowd

horse_breed.name: mustang
horse_breed.body_type: mall to medium-sized horses with strong legs and hooves, deep chests, and muscular bodies
horse_breed.personality: Mustangs are known for their intelligence, hardiness, and endurance. They are highly adaptable and social animals, with a strong herd instinct. They can be independent and have a free-spirited nature

horse_breed.name: andalusian
horse_breed.body_type: compact, muscular build, a short neck, a broad chest, and strong, sturdy legs
horse_breed.personality: The Andalusian horse is known for its intelligence, sensitivity, and courage, making it a popular choice for dressage and other high-level competitions. They are loyal, affectionate, and often have a calm and gentle demeanor, but can also be fiery and energetic when needed

horse_breed.name: shire
horse_breed.body_type: strong shoulder, sturdy legs, long, thick mane and tail, gentle temperament
horse_breed.personality: The Shire horse is a gentle giant breed that is known for their calm and docile nature. They have a kind and willing temperament, and they are easy to work with. They are patient, intelligent, and loyal animals that are often used for agricultural work, driving, and even therapy. Shire horses are typically friendly and affectionate towards people, and they enjoy human interaction. They are also known for their strong work ethic and willingness to please. These horses are very adaptable and can be trained for a variety of tasks. Despite their size, Shire horses are known for their gentle and easy-going personalities

horse_breed.name: nokota
horse_breed.personality: Nokota horses are known for their intelligence, curiosity, and independence. They are often described as being alert, spirited, and adaptable. Due to their wild heritage and strong instincts, they can possess a natural "wild" or untamed spirit, which can make them challenging to train for inexperienced handlers. However, with the right training and handling techniques, Nokota horses can become loyal and reliable partners

horse_breed.name: brumby
horse_breed.personality: Brumbies are known for their intelligence, resilience, and independent nature. They have adapted to survive in the harsh Australian wilderness, which has shaped their behavior. Brumbies can be wary of humans due to their wild origins, but with patient and consistent training, they can develop a bond with their handlers. They are known for their surefootedness and are often valued as trail or endurance horses. Brumbies can display a range of temperaments, with some individuals being more spirited and others more docile, depending on their individual upbringing and experiences.
